description.@en: Don’t be afraid, it’s just an eye, after all. “You mess with the bull,” as they say, “you get the horns.” But I got my payback— they won’t be coming back for revenge, rest assured.

data.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: You must flip the results to fail all Perceptionbased Skill Tests.
